name: Counter Terrorist Range Combat
description:
Counter Terrorist Range Combat is a fast-paced FPS that will test your reflexes and tactical skill. Keep open your eyes. Experience the thrill of modern terrorist warfare as you fight a critical strike operation as a counter-terrorist or aim to cause destruction as a terrorist. Join the competitive combat in the most skill-based portable FPS!

You can choose team, counter-terrorist or terrorist. You can just aim to enemy and shoot to kill. You can use many different weapons. Upgrade your weapons and bullets.

Many different scenes and levels, every levels are different enemy skills.
publishers: BROBABIL IC VE DIS TICARET LTD STI
